description:
Yokoshima Naruko is a teacher at Ousai Academy and the advisor of the student council. She is incredibly perverted, even more so than Aria and Shino, and aggressively seeks out younger guys, including her male students. In the anime, she teaches English and, true to form, her syllabus almost always has perverted content. She is perceived by the council members as unreliable and useless as an educator.
Source: Wiki
name: Yokoshima Naruko
